alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 1:22PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong wind through this evening, snow showers late tonight and Friday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts between 45 and 55 mph. Localized gusts from 60 to 65 mph around Clark. Snow showers late tonight and Friday. Accumulations generally under an inch but 2 to 3 inches possible where snow banding sets up. * WHERE...Cody Foothills. * WHEN...Strong wind through around 9 pm this evening, snow showers and blowing snow late tonight and Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Keep two hands on the steering wheel in case of sudden, strong wind gusts. Motorists are urged to watch for snow covered and slick roads as well as rapid changes in visibility if traveling late tonight and Friday.
